hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—The Way of Fruitfulness

lyrics.stanza: "If it die," oh, hear the message Falling from thy Lord, "If it die," much fruit it beareth, 'Tis thy Savior's word.
Would'st thou see life work in others, Thou thyself must die. Fall into the ground, be buried, Low in darkness lie.
But He leaves thee not in darkness, Light shall greet thine eyes, And in glad new life and glory He shall bid thee rise.
Dost thou crave to tread the pathway And His life to share? As thou passest thru death's gateway He will meet thee there.
Thou shalt learn the blessed secret, He shall live that dies; From a life poured out in secret Shall a harvest rise.
